definition: "ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
"fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to

sentences.english: Still, the issue James raised back in 1905 remains pertinent.
sentences.chinese: 然而詹姆斯在1905年提出的主题然仍值得讨论。

sentences.english: Will I feel sad when I continue my journey alone?
sentences.chinese: 让我孓然孤独地前行，我会悲伤吗？

sentences.english: But among those who had heard both requests, 50% agreed.

sentences.english: However, Commentators about history of literature paid little attention to literati going from south to north of the Xiao clan.
sentences.chinese: 然文学史论者对由南入北的萧氏文人却关注不多。

sentences.english: But much of the venom in the press, at any rate, is directed at big multinationals.

sentences.english: Except that month, her period was late.

definition: that being the case/then/in that case
